model.options

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.options.Options

  • public class Options
extends java.lang.Object
    The Options class is in charge of all canDo methods.
    Version:
    1.0 Build Jan, 2016.
    Author:
    Christian Riboldi, Clayton Condie, Jacob Brewer, Joshua Powers, Joshua Van Steeter
